title: Eiffel Tower
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 491 words, Level L (Grade 2), Lexile 660L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     U and Z1
description: Gustave Eiffel's iconic tower has overlooked Paris since the 1880s when it was opened to the public during the World's Fair. This interesting text explains how the structure was designed and built as well as what visitors can see today.
highFrequencyWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
